name: WalkPHL
description: This application was built for people visiting the city of Philadelphia. Travelers can earn badges for first time visits at any specified landmark

name: Alumni Portal
description: After students graduate from the coding bootcamp Tech Elevator, they will be invited to join the alumni portal where the graduates can share information with each other (this is private)

name: SocialApe
description: Users can write posts and share with the global feed (Twitter clone)

name: Programmer's Pursuit
description: Trivial Pursuit based game but with technical programming questions
